languages.text: "Амик'Соломон, страж законов. Ты держишься так близко к нему, потому что страшишься его приговоров? Напрасно. Лишь Неумирающий может судить тебя".
"Amic'Solomorne, keeper of the law — do you stay so close to him because you fear his verdicts? You fear in vain. Only the Undying One may judge you."
languages.original_text: "Амик'Соломон, страж законов. Ты держишься так близко к нему, потому что страшишься его приговоров? Напрасно. Лишь Неумирающий может судить тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Amic'Solomorne, keeper of the law. Do you stay so close to him because you fear his verdicts? You fear in vain. Only the Undying One may judge you."
"Amic'Solomorne, keeper of the law. Do you stay so close to him because you fear his verdicts? You fear in vain. Only the Undying One may judge you."
"Amic'Solomorne, keeper of the law — do you stay so close to him because you fear his verdicts? You fear in vain. Only the Undying One may judge you."
"Amic'Solomorne, keeper of the law — do you stay so close to him because you fear his verdicts? You fear in vain. Only the Undying One may judge you."
"Amic'Solomorne, keeper of the law — do you stay so close to him because you fear his verdicts? You fear in vain. Only the Undying One may judge you."
"Amic'Solomorne, keeper of the law — do you stay so close to him because you fear his verdicts? You fear in vain. Only the Undying One may judge you."

languages.text: 「法の守護者、ソロモーンよ。あなたが彼のそばを離れないのは、彼の裁きを恐れているからか？恐れるだけ無駄だ。あなたを裁くことができるのは、不死の者ただ一人だ」
languages.original_text: "Amic'Solomorne, keeper of the law — do you stay so close to him because you fear his verdicts? You fear in vain. Only the Undying One may judge you."

traits.locale_text: 「法の守護者、ソロモーンよ。あなたが彼のそばを離れないのは、彼の裁きを恐れているからか？恐れるだけ無駄だ。あなたを裁くことができるのは、不死の者ただ一人だ」

languages.text: "Amic'Solomorne, Hüter des Gesetzes. Bleibt Ihr in seiner Nähe, weil Ihr seine Urteile fürchtet? Diese Furcht ist unbegründet. Nur der Todlose darf über Euch urteilen."
languages.original_text: "Amic'Solomorne, keeper of the law — do you stay so close to him because you fear his verdicts? You fear in vain. Only the Undying One may judge you."

traits.locale_text: "Amic'Solomorne, Hüter des Gesetzes. Bleibt Ihr in seiner Nähe, weil Ihr seine Urteile fürchtet? Diese Furcht ist unbegründet. Nur der Todlose darf über Euch urteilen."

languages.text: « Amic'Solomorne, le gardien de la loi... Restez-vous à ses côtés parce que vous craignez ses verdicts ? Il n'y a pas lieu d'avoir peur. Seul l'Immortel est à même de vous juger. »
languages.original_text: "Amic'Solomorne, keeper of the law — do you stay so close to him because you fear his verdicts? You fear in vain. Only the Undying One may judge you."

traits.locale_text: « Amic'Solomorne, le gardien de la loi... Restez-vous à ses côtés parce que vous craignez ses verdicts ? Il n'y a pas lieu d'avoir peur. Seul l'Immortel est à même de vous juger. »

languages.text: «Amic'Solomorne, custodio de la ley. ¿Se mantiene tan cerca de él porque teme sus veredictos? Su temor es en vano. Solo el Inmortal puede juzgarle».
languages.original_text: "Amic'Solomorne, keeper of the law — do you stay so close to him because you fear his verdicts? You fear in vain. Only the Undying One may judge you."

traits.locale_text: «Amic'Solomorne, custodio de la ley. ¿Se mantiene tan cerca de él porque teme sus veredictos? Su temor es en vano. Solo el Inmortal puede juzgarle».

languages.text: “信者索罗蒙，律法的守护者，你与他走得这么近，莫非是因为你惧怕他的审判吗？你的恐惧是徒劳的，只有不死之神才有权审判你。”
languages.original_text: "Amic'Solomorne, keeper of the law — do you stay so close to him because you fear his verdicts? You fear in vain. Only the Undying One may judge you."

traits.locale_text: “信者索罗蒙，律法的守护者，你与他走得这么近，莫非是因为你惧怕他的审判吗？你的恐惧是徒劳的，只有不死之神才有权审判你。”

languages.text: "Kanunlardan mesul Amik'Solomorne, kararlarından korktuğun için mi ona bu kadar yakınsın? Boşuna korkuyorsun. Seni yalnızca Ölmeyen yargılayabilir."
languages.original_text: "Amic'Solomorne, keeper of the law — do you stay so close to him because you fear his verdicts? You fear in vain. Only the Undying One may judge you."

traits.locale_text: "Kanunlardan mesul Amik'Solomorne, kararlarından korktuğun için mi ona bu kadar yakınsın? Boşuna korkuyorsun. Seni yalnızca Ölmeyen yargılayabilir."
